sentences:
Mikhail Borisovich Kogan (; September 5 , 1893 in Zhitomir , Russian Empire – November 26 , 1951 in Moscow , USSR ) was a well - known medical doctor , a head of the therapy department of 2nd Moscow Medical Institute .
He treated well - known people as Samuel Marshak , Martiros Saryan , Dmitri Shostakovich , Vyacheslav Molotov and others .
He was one of the doctors named in the fabricated Joseph Stalin 's Doctors ' Plot in 1953 in spite of the fact that he had already died by the time when the first article about the plot was published .
He was the brother of , who was also a doctor named in the Doctor 's Plot and later arrested , and jailed .
